org.apache.cordova

接口 CordovaInterface

  • 所有已知实现类:
    CordovaInterfaceImpl

    public interface CordovaInterface
    The Activity interface that is implemented by CordovaActivity. It is used to isolate plugin development, and remove dependency on entire Cordova library.

    • 方法概要

      所有方法 实例方法 抽象方法 
      限定符和类型 方法和说明
      android.app.Activity getActivity()
      Get the Android activity.
      java.util.concurrent.ExecutorService getThreadPool()
      Returns a shared thread pool that can be used for background tasks.
      boolean hasPermission(java.lang.String permission)
      Check for a permission.
      java.lang.Object onMessage(java.lang.String id, java.lang.Object data)
      Called when a message is sent to plugin.
      void requestPermission(CordovaPlugin plugin, int requestCode, java.lang.String permission)
      Sends a permission request to the activity for one permission.
      void requestPermissions(CordovaPlugin plugin, int requestCode, java.lang.String[] permissions)
      Sends a permission request to the activity for a group of permissions
      void setActivityResultCallback(CordovaPlugin plugin)
      Set the plugin to be called when a sub-activity exits.
      void startActivityForResult(CordovaPlugin command, android.content.Intent intent, int requestCode)
      Launch an activity for which you would like a result when it finished.

    • 方法详细资料

      • startActivityForResult

        void startActivityForResult(CordovaPlugin command,
                            android.content.Intent intent,
                            int requestCode)
        Launch an activity for which you would like a result when it finished. When this activity exits, your onActivityResult() method will be called.
        参数:
        command - The command object
        intent - The intent to start
        requestCode - The request code that is passed to callback to identify the activity

      • setActivityResultCallback

        void setActivityResultCallback(CordovaPlugin plugin)
        Set the plugin to be called when a sub-activity exits.
        参数:
        plugin - The plugin on which onActivityResult is to be called

      • getActivity

        android.app.Activity getActivity()
        Get the Android activity.
        返回:
        the Activity

      • onMessage

        java.lang.Object onMessage(java.lang.String id,
                           java.lang.Object data)
        Called when a message is sent to plugin.
        参数:
        id - The message id
        data - The message data
        返回:
        Object or null

      • getThreadPool

        java.util.concurrent.ExecutorService getThreadPool()
        Returns a shared thread pool that can be used for background tasks.

      • requestPermission

        void requestPermission(CordovaPlugin plugin,
                       int requestCode,
                       java.lang.String permission)
        Sends a permission request to the activity for one permission.

      • requestPermissions

        void requestPermissions(CordovaPlugin plugin,
                        int requestCode,
                        java.lang.String[] permissions)
        Sends a permission request to the activity for a group of permissions

      • hasPermission

        boolean hasPermission(java.lang.String permission)
        Check for a permission. Returns true if the permission is granted, false otherwise.
